title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called Option::unwrap() on a None value'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust [](https://github.com/webrtc-rs/sctp/commit/7d58b8b2b701e190795fe52a540b24937012269d) ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. ```
